SummaryEnglish: Various warlords and their armies attempt to conquer and unify the nation. The struggles of these mighty martial heroes attracts the attention of the Mouryou King, the monstrous sovereign of evil spirits, who wishes to prolong the conflict and destroy the human world. To oppose the evil of the Mouryou King, an organization called Tengen forms anti-Mouryou armies that do battle all over China, but when the 6th anti-Mouryou corps is suddenly wiped out, a rag-tag band of adventurers is gathered to replace them and to form the new 6th anti-Mouryou corps.
Aliases: 幻想三國誌 天元霊心記

1.SummaryEnglish: A ragtag bunch sets out across a nation at war to find and eliminate wangliang, evil spirits that latch onto negativity and turn humans into monsters.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Hunters get word of a wangliang on the rampage, but the telltale miasma is nowhere to be found. A standoffish Xiao Ling strikes out on her own.

3.SummaryEnglish: A traumatic scene at a village triggers something deep within Xiao Ling, who takes on too much miasma and runs amok, endangering all those around her.

4.SummaryEnglish: Three blood brothers sworn to save a country at war are torn apart when a shadowy fortuneteller co-opts the youngest for her own nefarious purposes.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ding Yan's distrust of Xiao Ling is growing when he reunites with his old Sixth Unit comrades--who happen to have a problematic favor to ask of him.

6.SummaryEnglish: When Xiao Ling doesn't recover after her Guizhan duty, the team learns about the curse she bears, then takes a detour in hopes of a way to lift it.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ying Ji and Xiao Ling just can't seem to escape the wangliang that's hunting them. The entire Sixth Unit must work together to take the behemoth down.

8.SummaryEnglish: The team visits an insular group that claims to have a remedy for Xun Qiao's deathly ill brother, but they soon realize that something's not right.

9.SummaryEnglish: The truth of the cult is revealed, along with their reasons for wanting Xiao Ling. More revelations come to light as Xun Qiao mourns her dear brother.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Hunters enjoy some downtime after their last battle, courtesy of Lady Luozhi. Ying Ji must pay the price for keeping his teammate Xiao Ling safe.

11.SummaryEnglish: A betrayal is revealed, and the Hunters must once again rescue Xiao Ling after not one, but two villains are dead set on obtaining her curse-heart.

12.SummaryEnglish: The team must make a desperate, last-ditch effort to keep the Door of Grief closed and the world safe from the machinations of the Wangliang King.
